Package com.kneelawk.kmodlib.client.blockmodel.connector

Interface ModelConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockModelConnector, RenderTagModelConnector
public interface ModelConnector
Controls which connected models connect.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final ModelConnector DEFAULT
      The default model connector that is used if none are supplied.

    • CODEC

      static final com.mojang.serialization.Codec<ModelConnector> CODEC
      The model connector codec.

      This is either a registry-lookup codec or an identifier codec. If an identifier is supplied, a singleton-type model connector is expected. If an object is supplied, the type parameter is used to perform the lookup but the result can be either a decodable-type or singleton-type model connector.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      ModelConnector.Type getType()
      Returns:
      the type of this model connector, registered with KBlockModels.BLOCK_MODEL_CONNECTOR_REGISTRY.

    • canConnect

      boolean canConnect(net.minecraft.world.BlockRenderView view, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos otherPos, net.minecraft.util.math.Direction normal, net.minecraft.block.BlockState state, net.minecraft.block.BlockState otherState)
      Tests if the model governed by this connector should connect.
      Parameters:
      view - the view of the world (typically a chunk during client-side chunk-building).
      pos - the position of the block being connected.
      otherPos - the position of the block being connected to.
      normal - the direction of the block being connected to from the block being connected.
      state - the block state of the block being connected.
      otherState - the block state of the block being connected to.
      Returns:
      whether this block should connect to the other block.
